short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new tab, get a Ron Swanson quote

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new-tab page for Chrome that serves you up a random quote from one of history's greatest fictional men, Mr. Ron Swanson.

Supports light and dark themes, automatically synced with your system settings.
